data.caption: Result- Unaudited Financial Results For The Quarter Ended June 30, 2021
data.news_body: We submit Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter ended June 30, 2021.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting
data.news_body: Outcome of the Board Meeting held on August 11, 2021

data.caption: Regulation 23(9) - Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 23(9) of the Securities and Exchange Board of India (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we enclose the disclosures of Related Party Transactions on consolidated basis, as per the accounting standards for the half year ended March 31, 2021.

data.caption: Results-Delay in Financial Results
data.news_body: We submit herewith Audited Financial Results (Standalone & Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2021. The submission is delay due to technical issue (server failure by short circuit).

data.caption: Delay In Submission Of Outcome Of Board Meeting Due To Technical Issue
data.news_body: We submit herewith outcome of Board Meeting. Submission is delay due to technical issue (server failure by Short circuit).
